component.name: sdl-jstest
component.summary: Console based joystick test program for SDL

description.p: `sdl-jstest` is a simple console program that lets you find out how many joysticks SDL detected on your system, how many axes, buttons, hats and balls they have each. They also lets you test the joysticks by displaying the events they send or by displaying their current button, axis, hat or ball state. sdl-jstest is especially useful if you want to test your `SDL_LINUX_JOYSTICK` configuration.
